description: Hibs 6-1 Inter Club d'Escaldes: Have your say
title: Hibs 6-1 Inter Club d'Escaldes: Have your say
title_page: Hibs 6-1 Inter Club d'Escaldes: Have your say - BBC Sport
maintext:
Thank goodness for that, eh?
Hibs are safely through to the third round of Europa Conference League qualifying after thrashing Andorran side Inter Club d'Escaldes.
Were you at Easter Road for the victory or did you watch the game on the television?
No matter how you took the game in, we want to hear your thoughts on the game!
